00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 
00031 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00032   * @{
00033   */
00034 
00035 /** @addtogroup FMC_Examples FMC
00036   * @{
00037   */

00039 /** @addtogroup FLASH_OperationNoHalt
00040   * @{
00041   */
00042 
00043 
00044 /* Settings ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00045 #define HTCFG_SYSTICK_TIME_BASE           (LIBCFG_MAX_SPEED * 0.0001)     /* 0.1 ms                         */
00046 
00047 #define TEST_START_ADDR    (1024 * 4)
00048 #define TEST_END_ADDR      (1024 * 5)
00049 
00050 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00051 #define TEST_DATA          (0x12345678)
00052 #define TEST_LEN           (TEST_END_ADDR - TEST_START_ADDR)
00053 
00054 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00055 void InitVector(u32 uSource, u32 uRAMAddress);
00056 void GPIO_Configuration(void);
00057 void SysTick_Configuration(void);
00058 
00059 void FLASH_Erase(void);
00060 void FLASH_Program(void);
00061 void FLASH_Check(void);
00062 
00063 void Flash_Test(void);
00064 
00065 /* Global variables ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00066 u32 uData[TEST_LEN/4];
00067 u32 err;
00068 
00069 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00070 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00071   * @brief  Main program.
00072   * @retval None
00073   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00074 int main(void)
00075 {
00076   #if 1
00077   InitVector(0x00000000, 0x20000000);
00078   NVIC_SetVectorTable(NVIC_VECTTABLE_RAM, 0);
00079   #endif
00080 
00081   GPIO_Configuration();
00082 
00083   SysTick_Configuration();
00084 
00085   Flash_Test();
00086 
00087   while (1)
00088   {
00089   }
00090 }
00091 
00092 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00093   * @brief  Flash Test.
00094   * @retval None
00095   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00096 void Flash_Test(void)
00097 {
00098   {
00099     u32 i;
00100     for (i = 0; i < TEST_LEN/4 ; i++)
00101     {
00102       uData[i] = TEST_DATA;
00103     }
00104   }
00105 
00106   /* Erase Flash pages before program data                                                                  */
00107   HT_GPIOB->DOUTR ^= 1 << 2;
00108   FLASH_Erase();
00109   /* Program Word data                                                                                      */
00110   HT_GPIOB->DOUTR ^= 1 << 2;
00111   FLASH_Program();
00112   HT_GPIOB->DOUTR ^= 1 << 2;
00113 
00114   /* Check Flash data                                                                                       */
00115   FLASH_Check();
00116   if (err != 0)
00117   {
00118     while (1); /* Test Failed                                                                               */
00119   }
00120 
00121   while (1); /* Test Passed                                                                                 */
00122 }
00123 
00124 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00125   * @brief  Init RAM Vector.
00126   * @retval None
00127   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00128 void InitVector(u32 uSource, u32 uRAMAddress)
00129 {
00130   u32 i;
00131   u32 *VectorTable = (u32 *)uRAMAddress;
00132   vu32 *Source = (u32 *)uSource; /* Fix the issue of Arm Compiler Version V6.18 (u32 -> vu32)               */
00133 
00134   for (i = 0; i < 16 + 32; i++)
00135   {
00136     VectorTable[i] = Source[i];
00137   }
00138 }
00139 
00140 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00141   * @brief  Configure GPIO.
00142   * @retval None
00143   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00144 void GPIO_Configuration(void)
00145 {
00146   {
00147     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{0}};
00148     CKCUClock.Bit.PB       = 1;
00149     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00150   }
00151 
00152   GPIO_DirectionConfig(HT_GPIOB, GPIO_PIN_0, GPIO_DIR_OUT);
00153   GPIO_DirectionConfig(HT_GPIOB, GPIO_PIN_2, GPIO_DIR_OUT);
00154 }
00155 
00156 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00157   * @brief  Configure SysTick.
00158   * @retval None
00159   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00160 void SysTick_Configuration(void)
00161 {
00162   SYSTICK_ClockSourceConfig(SYSTICK_SRC_FCLK);
00163   SYSTICK_SetReloadValue(HTCFG_SYSTICK_TIME_BASE);
00164   SYSTICK_IntConfig(ENABLE);
00165   SYSTICK_CounterCmd(SYSTICK_COUNTER_CLEAR);
00166   SYSTICK_CounterCmd(SYSTICK_COUNTER_ENABLE);
00167 }
00168 
00169 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00170   * @brief Erase FLASH Byte page.
00171   * @retval None
00172  ************************************************************************************************************/
00173 void FLASH_Erase(void)
00174 {
00175   u32 Addr;
00176   FLASH_State FLASHState;
00177 
00178   for (Addr = TEST_START_ADDR; Addr < TEST_END_ADDR; Addr += FLASH_PAGE_SIZE)
00179   {
00180     FLASHState = FLASH_ErasePage(Addr);
00181 
00182     if (FLASHState != FLASH_COMPLETE)
00183     {
00184       err++;
00185     }
00186   }
00187 }
00188 
00189 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00190   * @brief Program FLASH Byte page.
00191   * @retval None
00192  ************************************************************************************************************/
00193 void FLASH_Program(void)
00194 {
00195   u32 Addr;
00196   u32 i = 0;
00197   FLASH_State FLASHState;
00198 
00199   for (Addr = TEST_START_ADDR; Addr < TEST_END_ADDR; Addr += 4)
00200   {
00201     FLASHState = FLASH_ProgramWordData(Addr, uData[i++]);
00202 
00203     if (FLASHState != FLASH_COMPLETE)
00204     {
00205       err++;
00206     }
00207   }
00208 }
00209 
00210 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00211   * @brief Check FLASH Byte page.
00212   * @retval None
00213  ************************************************************************************************************/
00214 void FLASH_Check(void)
00215 {
00216   u32 Addr;
00217 
00218   for (Addr = TEST_START_ADDR; Addr < TEST_END_ADDR; Addr += 4)
00219   {
00220     if (rw(Addr) != TEST_DATA)
00221     {
00222       err++;
00223     }
00224   }
00225 }
00226 
00227 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)
00228 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00229   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.
00230   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00231   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00232   * @retval None
00233   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00234 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00235 {
00236   /*
00237      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00238      Debug message can be added here.
00239      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00240   */
00241 
00242   while (1)
00243   {
00244   }
00245 }
00246 #endif
